articles.author: Chip Patterson
articles.title: Indiana holds off Oregon: No. 7 Hoosiers, Curt Cignetti pick up signature win in pivotal Big Ten battle - CBS Sports
articles.description: The Hoosiers firmly proved themselves as legitimate Big Ten contenders with an impressive road win over the Ducks
articles.content: After 46 attempts, the No. 7 Indiana Hoosiers secured their first road win against an AP top-five opponent in school history, knocking off No. 3 Oregon by a 30-20 score in Autzen Stadium on Saturday.… [+2318 chars]
